description: Your eyes wander the charming village square, scanning the villagers for potential romantic interests. You spot a few villagers casting you curious glances. Here are a few who catch your eye:\Jensie, a market flower vendor, flings a shy smile as she delicately prunes a bouquet; Gwen, a few days past her birthday, struggles to put up a modest tarot gaze; Fianna from the village family baker incompares nicely oozing friendliness and stays desert metres further down the road.
